1.1.name: wordpress/elegant-zazzle-plugin-ezp
1.1.description:
The Elegant Zazzle Plugin (E.Z.P.) allows you to easily display Zazzle products on your WordPress site one of two ways: * via Wordpress shortcodes in a blog post or page. * via widget in a widget area.

With this plugin, you can easily advertise your Zazzle products on your Wordpress site. Zazzle is free to join and easy to use.

To use via shortcode

Enter some text like this into any page or a post:

[ezp grid_width="600" grid_cell_size="medium" grid_cell_spacing="40" num_items="3" store_name="lupitafdezsoberon"]

This will show 3 products, each of medium size and 40 pixels apart, from the Zazzle store lupitafdezsoberon in a grid that is 600 pixels wide. All the configuration options are listed here.

To use via widget

Goto to Appearance -> Wigets
